definition: to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

sentences.english: The criminal who looted the bank has been hounded down.
sentences.chinese: 抢劫银行的那名罪犯已被捉拿归案了。

sentences.english: Thanks for bounties on wolves and coyotes.
sentences.chinese: 感谢捉拿狼群和小狼的赏金。

sentences.english: Let not nemesis catch me by the swift ships.
sentences.chinese: 不要让报应女神娜美西斯用快捷的船舰捉拿我。

sentences.english: He remembered instances in which defaulters had been captured.
sentences.chinese: 他想起一些盗用公款的罪犯被捉拿归案的例子。

sentences.english: Windu arranged a group of Jedi Masters to arrest the Chancellor.
sentences.chinese: 温杜安排了一队绝地大师去捉拿议长。

sentences.english: They acted in conjunction with the police in the hunt for the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 他们于警察联合行动捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: Bink remembered one of his own bitter experiences with that bunch, not so many years ago.
sentences.chinese: 宾克想起几年前被那伙人捉拿的痛苦经历。

sentences.english: This finally have the solid, w. connor rate return take WangXiaoGong soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 这下终于有了铁证，马戎率兵回城捉拿王小红。

sentences.english: Yang ling spirit seven I smoke, there and then commanded his men with the soldiers behind seize tang wall.
sentences.chinese: 杨林气得七窃生烟，当场吩咐手下人带追兵捉拿唐壁。

sentences.english: We find them; we take them as a team and we bring them back.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到他们，把他们一网打尽，捉拿归案。

sentences.english: The father in the imperial decree that its take back the thief.
sentences.chinese: 父皇在圣旨中叫其捉拿反贼。

sentences.english: The police set a trap to catch the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 警察设下圈套捉拿杀人犯。

sentences.english: Once I met with a dozen enemy soldiers and took them prisoners singlehanded .
sentences.chinese: 一次我遇到一打敌兵，单独把他们捉拿为囚徒。

sentences.english: Catching the " Gang of Four " at one stroke.
sentences.chinese: 一举把“四人帮”捉拿归案。

sentences.english: The police are tying to round up the jewel thieves and bring them to justice.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在设法将盗窃珠宝的窃贼捉拿归案。

sentences.english: According to the authentic news , the grafter has been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 据可靠消息，那名贪污犯已被捉拿归案。

definition: to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
to break into jail/to forcibly release prisoners
